object.name: stopPoll
object.description: Use this method to stop a poll which was sent by the bot. On success, the stopped Poll is returned.
object.html_description: Use this method to stop a poll which was sent by the bot. On success, the stopped Poll is returned.
object.rst_description: Use this method to stop a poll which was sent by the bot. On success, the stopped :class:`aiogram.types.poll.Poll` is returned.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)

annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Identifier of the original message with the poll
annotations.html_description: Identifier of the original message with the poll
annotations.rst_description: Identifier of the original message with the poll
annotations.name: message_id
